reviewtext: My primary purpose when purchasing this headphone is to drown out loud background noise.  Secondary is music listening (I am not a music buff).  Wear it for about  4 hours each time and it is still comfortable when I take it off.  I work in a very loud place (computer data center room) and this device drowns out the noise really well!  I will leave the "how well the sound is delivered"  out of my review as there are numerous other reviews that can convey that message much better.
summary: Excellent at drowning out background noise for less than $100
